name: Fanatic Booty
description:
Tired of dreaming of a bigger fuller butt. Don't have or want to spend thousands of dollars on surgery. We have the solution ladies. This innovative pant liner will make all your bulge worries disappear in an instant. Look fabulously sleek and sexy without those horrible panty lines. Controls the abdomen effectively. High compression material creates your figure. 

Features: Triple POWERNET design gives you firm control. Open Butt feature gives you a natural lift of 2-3 inches.

Target Areas: Butt, Abdomen and Hips. 
Control Level: Firm Control
Comes in colors Nude and Black. 

* Suggested you order a size up.

*Must specify color you want otherwise we will ship out available stock.

name: "Im Bout that No Waist Life" Logo Tee
No Waist Fanatics Distributor Opportunity
description:

name: "Latex Ab's"
description:
The "Latex Ab's" works by utilizing perfectly applied compression and providing resistance to ramp up your thermal activity, maximizing the work your muscles do for you to promote weight loss. Simply wear the garment discreetly underneath your clothing for a 8 hour minimum daily, habitually for a month, and see a reduction in your waistline. Furthermore, the shaper's dual column eye-hook design ensures you'll maintain a snug fit while you slim down. Never again have to choose between instant results and a lasting figure!


When ordering larger than a size 38 it is recommended that you use the Fanatic Elite Vest.

name: Latex Abs Trio
description:
The "Latex Ab's" extended addition. This 3 row waist trainer works by applying compression to your mid-section and ramping up your thermal activity. You can maximizing the work your muscles which  promotes weight loss. Simply wear the garment discreetly underneath your outfit  8 hours a day habitually for a month, and see a reduction in your waistline. Furthermore, the shaper's NEW THREE column eye-hook design ensures you'll maintain a snug fit. Never again have to think twice. Achieve instant results and a lasting figure!

When ordering larger than a size 38 it is recommended that you use the Fanatic Elite Vest.

name: "Fanatic Elite Vest"
description:
The "Fanatic Elite" is a superior upper body garment that accelerates weight loss. Targeting back fat, bra rolls and the abdomen at the same time. This garment assist by lifting, shaping and slimming the upper body, stomach and waist area.  Another great benefit  of this product is that it also corrects & improve posture while still providing full support and coverage of the back.

Available with thick straps or bra straps per request. Otherwise you will be sent available stock.

name: "Fanatic Waister"
description:
The "Fanatic Waister" is our most popular garment. Anytime you are going to be active whether it's the gym, run, walk or your daily routine this garment will work. Wearing this garment on your mid-section triggers compression to your core. This compression stimulates thermal activity and ramps up perspiration. This process allows toxins and impurities to exit the skin while mobilizing fat cells. If you have been thinking about adding a supplement to your active lifestyle then this product is for you!


When ordering larger than a size 38 it is recommended that you use the Fanatic Elite Vest.

name: "Limited Edition Fanatic Waister Trio"
description:
New LIMITED COLOR & 3rd ROW now available. Same great waist training. Limited quantity so don't miss out! 

Anytime you are going to be active whether it's the gym, run, walk or your daily routine this garment will work. Wearing this garment on your mid-section triggers compression to your core. This compression stimulates thermal activity and ramps up perspiration. This process allows toxins and impurities to exit the skin while mobilizing fat cells. If you have been thinking about adding a supplement to your active lifestyle then this product is for you!

When ordering larger than a size 38 it is recommended that you use the Fanatic Elite Vest.

name: "Fanatic Thong Suit"
description:
The "Fanatic Thong" is a one-piece body shaper that includes adjustable & removable straps. This body reducer is made out off PowerNet material which creates a seamless look underneath any attire. This suit instantly corrects posture and  also helps control your waist by instantly slimming your waist 1-2 inches. If you are looking to flatten your abdomen area and create that hourglass figure, then this suit is what you need. 

-Lateral zipper 
-Power net material 
-Molds the figure comfortably 
-Extra control thong
-High compression thong vest.
-High back arches helps eliminate bra-buldge. 
-Premium cotton lining. 
-Convertible straps
-Hook-and-eye
-Bathroom opening 

*Must specify color you want otherwise we will ship out available stock.

name: Fanatic EXTREME
description:
Fanatic EXTREME Suit reduces the waist, abdomen, and thighs while lifting your natural buttocks 2 inches on each side for a firm and toned rear end. Comfortably lined with cotton for all day wear.  Features removable adjustable shoulder straps. Designed with a zip front closure and an open crotch for your convience. 

**This product runs very small, please select 2 sizes larger for a great fit.

name: "Fanatic 6n1"
description:
Body shaper made of Powernet. This one-piece suit is completely seamless. It corrects the posture, eliminates excess of fluids and also benefits the lumbar region so you can avoid twists and backaches. Perfect for postpartum recovery as well. It assists in eliminating flaccidity following liposuction. Equipped with zipper on front/side and opening crotch for convenience. It works as a body shaper that makes you look slim and sexy every time you wear it.  (Bra not included).

#1 Lift up the buttocks.
#2 High Compression.
#3 Help to lose weight.
#4 Reduce waist and abdomen.
#5 Open in the Crotch.
#6 Reduces/control hips and thighs

*Must specify color you want otherwise we will ship out available stock.

name: Seaweed Natural Slimming Cream
description:
Refirms and tones your skin! Contains seaweed and spirulina

to naturally revitalize your skin and help with elasticity.

Ideal for full body treatments. Works to fight cellulite

and smooth stretch marks.

*Firms and tones the skin

*Contains marine algae and espirulina

*Ideal for the whole Body

name: Caffeine Cream
description:
Caffeine cream helps achieve a flat belly, a sculpted figure and reduces the sight of stretch marks and accumulating grease & it also reduces the appearance of cellulite.

CONTAINS: COFFEE EXTRACT, MENTHOL, & SPIRULINE

HOW TO USE : Apply cream around your waist after shower, massage it in circular motion, Let the product adsorb into the skin, Then apply Osmotic Wrap or Saran Clear Wrap for maximum absorption

name: Clear Wrap Applicators
description:
Clear wrap is the original method used with our Caffeine Cream or Seaweed Natural Firming Cream to speed up the process in burning fat tissue Use it with our corsets for better results.

How to use;
-Apply firming gel or caffeine cream.
-Let the cream absorb in the skin.
-Wrap clear wrap around your waist.
-Put on your cincher.

name: Osmotic Wrap
description:
Osmotic wrap is to be used with our Caffeine Cream or Natural Cream to speed up the process in burning fat tissue Use it with our corsets for better results.

How to use;
-Apply firming gel or caffeine cream
-Wrap Osmotic clear wrap around your waist
-Put on your cincher.

name: "Fanatic No Bend Board"
description:
This pear shaped compression board is a great addition to your waist training garment. Our garments are made with Flexi Bond material so when your sit or  bend the Flexi bonding bends with you. Overtime your garment can begin to form a pocket. This No-Bend Board  keeps the corset in the straight up right position and a leveled compression applied to your lower abdominal area. Prevents skin indentations due to your garment bending.

-One size fits all

name: Fanatic Removable Strap Mid Body w/ Adjustable Hooks
